GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF ENGAGEMENT

  1. SCOPE OF ENGAGEMENT The Client engages the Attorney to provide legal counsel and/or court representation. The Attorney commits to implementing all necessary means to best defend the Client's interests.
  2. FEES AND EXPENSES 2.1. Calculation Basis Fees are calculated according to the following terms:
  • Base hourly rate for a Junior Lawyer: 120€/hour
  • Base hourly rate for a Senior Lawyer: 200€/hour
  • Administrative costs: 80€/hour
  • Travel expenses: 80€/hour

2.2. Retainer A retainer of [amount]€ is required upon signing this agreement. This amount will be deducted from the final billing.

  1. ATTORNEY'S OBLIGATIONS The Attorney commits to:
  • Maintain attorney-client privilege
  • Regularly inform the Client of case developments
  • Implement best expertise
  • Avoid any conflicts of interest
  1. CLIENT'S OBLIGATIONS The Client commits to:
  • Provide all necessary information and documents
  • Cooperate in good faith
  • Pay fees within agreed timeframes
  • Inform the Attorney of any relevant changes
  1. FILE RETENTION AND DOCUMENT STORAGE Files will be retained for 5 years after the end of the engagement. Beyond this period, they may be destroyed unless expressly requested otherwise by the Client.
  2. DATA PROTECTION Personal data processing is conducted in accordance with GDPR and the firm's privacy policy.
  3. TERMINATION Either party may terminate the engagement with 15 days written notice, subject to payment for services already rendered.
  4. LIABILITY The Attorney maintains professional liability insurance with [insurance company name].
  5. APPLICABLE LAW AND JURISDICTION This agreement is governed by Belgian law. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts of [city].
  6. MEDIATION In case of dispute, parties commit to attempting mediation before any legal action.
